0.speaker: sol
0.text: Um, Teddy?

0.speaker: teddy
0.text: Hmm...?

0.speaker: sol
0.text: Do you know where we are?

0.speaker: teddy
0.text: Mmm... No, not really. I've just been following this butterfly. See the wings? They change colors in the light!

0.speaker: sol
0.text: Um, that's nice, but do you think we might be a little, well, lost?

0.speaker: teddy
0.text: Huh, I guess we are.

0.speaker: sol
0.text: W-what?! Then we need to get back to the car! To mom, to dad!

0.speaker: teddy
0.text: Hey, hey, we will, don't worry. We just gotta go back the way we came, right?

0.speaker: sol
0.text: Right, right. I think we came from... that way.

0.speaker: teddy
0.text: Well then, lead the way!

0.speaker: sol
0.text: What are you doing? We need to go that way. I thought I saw some light in that direction.

0.speaker: teddy
0.text: Oooh, but come look at this flower. It's special!

0.speaker: sol
0.text: Um, yeah, sure. But we should really be going...

0.speaker: teddy
0.text: No no no, you're not looking. Look closer!
You see a glimmer of light through the branches, but the way is blocked by thorny vines. Wouldn't want to go in there.
You investigate the flower closer. It's a rose with the brightest red petals you've ever seen.

0.speaker: sol
0.text: Wow, that's... beautiful. I didn't even notice it before.

0.speaker: teddy
0.text: Isn't it? Aaahhh, I love the forest. It's so much more colorful than the bed, haha!

0.speaker: teddy
0.text: Ahh, bed... sleepy... zzz...

0.speaker: sol
0.text: What- hey, hey! Teddy!

0.speaker: teddy
0.text: zzz... UP, I'm up! I'm not asleep!

0.speaker: sol
0.text: Ha ha! You almost fell asleep standing up!

0.speaker: teddy
0.text: Ha ha... Yeah, um, I almost did.

0.speaker: sol
0.text: Do you think mom would like the rose?

0.speaker: teddy
0.text: Well of course she would! We should bring it to her!

0.speaker: sol
0.text: Yeah, she would.
You try to pluck the rose. As your fingers brush the petals, you hear a creaking of vines shifting from the other end of the clearing.

0.speaker: sol
0.text: Did you hear that?

0.speaker: teddy
0.text: Hmm?

0.speaker: sol
0.text: I think the rose loosened those vines over there.

0.speaker: sol
0.text: Maybe there's more! And maybe if we find them, we can get through the vines!

0.speaker: teddy
0.text: Yes, genius! Let's go look for more.

1.text: You gently brush the rose's petals, soft as velvet. You hear the vines shift a little further.

2.text: You gently brush the rose's petals, soft as velvet. You hear the vines shift and creak, and a pathway forward appears.

2.speaker: sol
2.text: Look, the path is open! We can keep going!

2.speaker: shadow
2.text: Yes, yes, well done both of you.

2.speaker: shadow
2.text: I am a resident of this forest. I came to welcome you both. Please, make yourselves at home.

2.speaker: sol
2.text: Um, t-t-thank you very much, but we won't be staying long. We need to get back to my parents.

2.speaker: shadow
2.text: Oh, but please, won't you stay a while? It's been so long since I could offer... hospitality.

2.speaker: teddy
2.text: Well sure! We'd love a little hospitality. Right?

2.speaker: sol
2.text: I-I-I think what my friend is trying to say here is, um, we'd love to stay, but we really do need to be moving on.

2.speaker: shadow
2.text: Very well. Move on if you must. But please, enjoy your time here. You may find the forest more... enticing... than you expect.
